attributes.action: Award Paddy Mayne the Victoria cross
attributes.background: Award Paddy Mayne the Victoria cross for performing heroic acts of gallantry, by shooting the Germans in a truck to save 2 wounded comrades while also allowing the Canadian division to advance

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
